const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: 'twitter',
  body: {
    mappings: {
      properties: {
        counter: {
          type: 'integer',
          store: false
        },
        tags: {
          type: 'keyword',
          store: true
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
